Subject: Finished Chapter 2
From: "James Trahern" <4idlamo@...>

 Well, it's been a long time since I worked on the story, what with University and all. But in some spare time I've written up a bit more for my gladiator_story.rtf.

Somehow, my email address got disconnected by yahoo! groups for some reason, so I've been missing out on the email for some time now.
Once again, come check it out at www.angelfire.com/rpg/zjackrum . Anyone who liked chapter one I hope will continue to enjoy the story I'm beginning to unravel.
Apologies to Tevildo. I actually was taking care to spell your name properly, but somehow that extra L got in there anyway. It's fixed now, man!
Deathifier: Don't suppose you got a better name in mind? It doesn't work too well as a cleric's name...
Anyone else: Need a name for the new character introduced.... If you're on the list and you want to be famous, gimme and email and I'll set you up.

As always, post replies either here or to my email address, where they will be keyword-searched for words like "Like" and "good" and "awesome" and if I don't find them i'll email-bomb them back to you :)

Some feedback would be nice as to where to go for chapter 3....

One last thing: I've re-registered at yahoo groups under the nickname Zjackrum, which is my new alias. In the next edition of gladiator_story.rtf, the Trahern character will be switched to Zjackrum, which I prefer.
-Trahern/Zjackrum
